text: The men's K-4 1000 metres competition of the canoeing event at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games was held on 6 June 2015 at the Marina Channel in Singapore. ==Schedule== All times are Singapore Standard Time (UTC+08:00) {|class ="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !Date !Time !Event |-style="background-color:lemonchiffon;" |Saturday, 6 June 2015 ||09:00 ||Final |} == Results == : {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !Rank !!Rowers !!Country !!Time |- | ||align=left|Borriboonwasin Kasemsit Phaophat Piyaphan Sommit Anusorn Waenphrom Nathaworn ||align=left| ||3:04.781 |- | ||align=left|Hidayat Asep Riyondra Maizir Sutrisno Sutrisno Suyatno Dedi Kurniawan ||align=left| ||3:04.953 |- | ||align=left|Ko Myint Ko Latt Zaw Wai Sha Saw Kay Tun Yazar ||align=left| ||3:07.415 |- |4 ||align=left|Chong Jonathan Low Benjamin Tay Zi Qiang Yap Keat Howe Luke ||align=left| ||3:12.087 |- |5 ||align=left|Lê Văn Dũng Nguyễn Tường Trần Văn Vũ Trương Văn Hoài ||align=left| ||3:19.509 |- |6 ||align=left|Ibrahim Mohd Azlan Mohamed Jamalludin Ramli Mohd Sukri Satta Imam Sujadi ||align=left| ||3:35.208 |} ==References== ==External links== * Men's K-4 1000 metres
title: Canoeing at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games – Men's K-4 1000 metres
